title: Netflix Househokds started in India! This sucks
comments: Got the same today. Aint subscribing.
We have 1 netflix account with 4 profiles and these are used by only 4 of us. Will such arrangements be discontinued? Because mine is still working.
Are you using same IP? Same router/same/house? If not then it will charge extra
No. We are in different countries lol
cant really blame them. if you think this in a business point of view, its fair.

What countries are you in?

Is one of the countries allowing sharing (Netflix)

Sweden, UAE, India, India.

Not sure if Sweden and UAE allow sharing.

my case is a bit weird. two floors. two different internet connections. same family. same account. haven't gotten the message yet but i have been wondering since the original announcement what to do. extending wired network is going to be too much work and wireless would provide horrible speeds. stupidity all around.
So weird, how does Netflix expect the 4 screens to be in the same wifi network!
UAE has started limiting shared accounts. Those with DU started first, Etisalat soon.
I have no idea since I'm in India. Thanks for the info.
Same here! Each floor has a router.
